name: you died (again)
description:
Have you ever been in another country while not knowing the language? That's exactly what happens to you in this game!

With one exception - you're on some Classified Facility, and people kill you if they find you suspicious.

But fear not! Your good friend Stain would gladly help you get trough it by translating words. After you die, of course.

Again and again.

That's a visual novel created in Ren'Py. But with a twist of not knowing words until they're translated to you.

Click and choose your way through the story.

Have fun guessing what's going on from all the bits of information available and share your thoughts!

All members would be listed later. But there are five of us!

And we all are dead.

Deadline killed us.

Or was it some shady sci-fi organisation? Who knows.

Ludum Dare 47 entry. You can vote for our game here:

You'll need it.
